meanings.definition: A barbiturate derivative used as a sedative or hypnotic.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed secobarbitals to help the patient sleep peacefully.
meanings.sent2: Secobarbitals are often administered before surgery to induce relaxation.
meanings.sent3: After taking secobarbitals, the sheep counted themselves to sleep!
meanings.sent4: The secobarbitals wrapped the mind in a gentle embrace, lulling it to rest.
meanings.sent5: The soft whispers of secobarbitals carried the weary soul into dreamland.

meanings.definition: A type of drug that acts as a central nervous system depressant.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained how secobarbitals slow down brain activity.
meanings.sent2: Secobarbitals can have a calming effect on the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The party guests joked that secobarbitals turned the dance floor into a slow-motion scene!
meanings.sent4: In the silence of the night, secobarbitals hushed the chaos within.
meanings.sent5: The gentle touch of secobarbitals quieted the storm raging in the mind.
